page.title: 10CLUBS
page.content: Muckamore Cricket and Tennis Clubs is found on our block. The Cricket Club was the founding club in l874 by John Joseph Robinson who had connections with York Street Flax Spinning Company in Belfast. Over its long history the Club took some time to reach the ambition of Senior League Status. This was achieved in l955. Since then the Club's fortunes have been a succession of triumphs and disappointments moving to and from Senior League, at present in Senior League Section 2. The Tennis Club was founded in l908 after some years of informal matches played on the cricket outfield. The Club became a social centre in the area. The Club flourished and had its best years in the l950's. A decline in the l960's has been followed by a gradual revival.
